stable.body:
• Shizuku support
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• Various UI improvements
• Various bug fixes
• Monochrome icon
stable.bodyMarkdown:
## Features
- **themes**: `Pitch black` option, overhaul [#50](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/50) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/10f504102cd1e64100997713ace2d5dbb078a346))
- overhaul settings [#50](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/50) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/9586eaa2e69b23e2118d7910c167eff34e4352a1))
- **l10n**: update Turkish translations [#51](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/51) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/7792819068f7a523d04e3dc0cd974436e1b945d3))

## Bug Fixes
- **map-button**: correct height [#50](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/50) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/4eec10e9e9840fb9bdef8e065d7a9bec5491a95c))
